data.text: @EU_Commission @vonderleyen Stop talking about single sanctions, full economic embargo - it is a crime to deal with criminals! And no Schengen visa for Russians- put them on par with the Ukrainians.
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen You are too late
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen As Europe we must do more than standing by #Ukraine or simply condemn the Russian ofensive. Action is an imperative. No one should be left behind

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen 70 year old fat man trying to take over the world it’s just stupid as this point if war really does happen ain’t no body going to win only lose in this generation it would just be bomb after bomb with lots of death no point tbh.
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Useless organization.
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen It's not enough. What is this? A joke? Stop Putin now until it's not too late for all of us
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Stop trade with Russia
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Hey Uschi, who actually elected you? Oh wait - NOBODY !🤡🥳

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen He’s crazy! the russian should free themselves from this crazy dictator, and the world will live a better life too. 20 years in power is way too much, power leads to crazyness.
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen So what about sanction on gaming? Belarus "wargaming", millions $ etc. Many Russian & Belarus company keep`s Europeans in virtual world. This business is worth billions.
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Des lâches
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen I pay taxes for this? Immediately throw them out of swift, troops on the Ukrainian borders and No fly zones!
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen So we are not going to talk about Libya???
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Or else???
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen and why you didn't condemn the barbaric attack on gaze by isra-el.. ki-lling children and women and men .. you piece of 💩

@EU_Commission Terrorists like Putin and members of the Russian government must be stopped by military means.  EU and NATO decision-makers are to blame for what is happening in Ukraine.  If Putin continues with the invasion of Macron, Scholz, Biden, etc.  they are accomplices.

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen When rich make war, poor people die. 
Shame on all of you.

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen You had 8 years. 8 long fucking years to find a solution as per the Minsk agreement and now you want to start after Ukraine has tortured and killed Russian civilians? Tf is wrong with you

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen THERE ARE 30 COUNTRIES IN NATO!!!!! 30!!! 

Each country sends just 10,000 troops = 300,000 troops and just end this absolute disgusting leader and his army!!! #UkraineRussia
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Just pray for U and do nothing LOL
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Spain out of the European Union now!!!!!! EspaÑexit

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen It’s not helping, please wake up !!! Mobilise the troops to come and back up the east countries , 1700 tanks are in Ukraine, don’t do the same mistake when Ww2 began !!! Reinforce the east part of Europe!!!
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen What is War in this century!! IT MUST END IMMEDIATELY!! #Ukraina !!
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Blaaa blaaaa bla blaa bla bla bla blaaa bla bla blaaaaaa....

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen And then what you gonna do ?
Just keep kondemning
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen she doesnt project confidence does she?
@EU_Commission @LSpyropoulou @vonderleyen Boş laflara devam
@EU_Commission Where  are the actual interventions? Whilst I had the thought of an even bigger war, where is the military show of the West? Putin clearly does not care about the financial sanctions.
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen How we are suppose to have trust that both sides do not play manipulative games in the name of greater "energy and power" interest?
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen The European Commission speaks.... That will have Putin shaking in his boots you useless bunch of reprobates!
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Russia warned us but we did not listen. Ukraine joining NATO was a red line not to be crossed
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Are we waiting for new serious sanctions? Or only words&
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Once again, the EU will be a proud bystander!

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Your decisions have been part of the problem we have today. Why have you ignored LPR and DPR all together, all these years when Kiev has bombed them. 8 years. And you have done nothing but fuelling the war.
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen this is actually scary
@EU_Commission @adamonzon @vonderleyen La tensión se acumula... esto no pinta bien... 🙁
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen This world is becoming chaotic because there are no one really stand up for the weaks and always yield to tyrannies

@EU_Commission @EUDelegationTur @vonderleyen Don't talk, do it! Your weak strategies and covard position made Russia Great Again!

If you do not have courage to resist, let braves do it.

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen CUT RUSSIA FROM SWIFT NOW!

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Zij wel. Trok net de champagne open en belde meteen met @ProfKlausSchwab. #NewWorldOrder #BuildBackBetter #TheGreatReset
@EU_Commission @JJansaSDS @vonderleyen where is a polish money ursula ?!!!
@EU_Commission All of European countries are extremely coward… god bless Ukraine and the world will never forget your hypocrisy….
@EU_Commission @vonderleyen Day 1 of the war in Ukraine

Close / Shut down your your airspaces for ANY Russian or Russian cooperating Aircarrier NOW!

The constant waffling from Brussels about autocrats (Erdogan, Putin,...) led to disillusionment. NATO & UN have completely failed!

@EU_Commission 🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡

@EU_Commission EU army NOW, MANDATORY Nato minimal spending NOW

@EU_Commission  @Pontifex Urge His Holiness 2 mediate immediately bet Russia & Ukraine, NATO & US 4 peace in the region, lest, many Christians get killed in the war that may erupt. Many were killed in WWI & II we don't want anymore Christians killed & the demons rule the world.

@EU_Commission @Europarl_NL @POTUS @USArmy @usairforce  cowards! Fight for freedom! Defend #Ukraina 
Your weak responces allowed #war in europe

@EU_Commission Putin wants a bloodbath!Three days ago he said that"it"does not recognize Ukraine as a sovereign state! So the Donbass separatists have nothing to do with this! This is the return of a 1945 military dictator!
The EU must defend Ukraine, humanly and militarily!

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen What can we do to help #Ukraine other than giving Russia sanctions that will do absolutely NOTHING for the people of Ukraine right now this minute, tomorrow or the next day… @BorisJohnson @POTUS #RussiaUkraineConflict #Putin #IStandWithUkraine

@EU_Commission @EuropeDirectTO EU and NATO have generated this conflict, with constant and progressive provocations.
You have generated this war but the citizens will pay the consequences.
@EU_Commission NO WAR !! THIS STUFF SHOULD STOP!! #Ukraina !!

@EU_Commission Just talking which never helps.
@EU_Commission make sure the shutdown of the Russian economy doesn't affect the innocent
@EU_Commission cc @pmakela1 Kai ne miettii humanitaarista apua siellä. Miten mietitään asiasta Suomessa?

@EU_Commission Well done, President von der Leyen.
@EU_Commission EC attack on Poland and NS2 led to the war.  you owe it.  Putin can do anything because of you.
@EU_Commission @Bundeskanzler #BanRussianTradeNow

@EU_Commission How is it unprovoked, the EU and the USA need to stop lying. We all are aware of the history. Putin has been warning the west for decades about their expansion. If missiles were placed anywhere close to the US we woudnt hear the end of it, Hypocrites brood of vipers.

@EU_Commission @NATO given current events it is clear that the EU needs its own unified army and its own massive nuclear deterrence in addition to what our american and british friends as well as France provide. Just in case the US have to focus their attention elsewhere.

@EU_Commission Putin betreibt eindeutig Hitlers "Heim ins Reich"-Politik. Dieser muss unmissverständlich, rasch und hart entgegnet werden. Wichtig dabei sind ebenfalls die Finanzmärkte Schweiz und London.

@EU_Commission should wake up from this “sanctions” non-sense on Russia. Russia doesn’t give a fuck about your sanctions and as long as there is no swift response to it’s actions, it will continue to fade any pat-on-the-back-sanction that comes along. #UkraineRussiaConflict
@EU_Commission @dev_discourse People are going to die for no reason, stop this fuck immediately as possible, 😭😭

@EU_Commission @fjmostert A press statement! Brilliant!
Is Putin withdrawing already?

@EU_Commission #shame Europe will be responsible for every innocent life taken in this war, standing with Ukraine means nothing. We could as well have made no statement at all and save some face. Just write thoughts and prayers since this is all we are doing as Europe

1. All Russian assets seized by U.S./EU must be declared Ukrainian 
2. Charge Putin for crimes against humanity at the International Criminal Court
3. All EU/US/international services of ALL KIND unavailable to ALL Russian citizens

@EU_Commission Newton's 3rd law "for every action there is reaction" is prooven false b/c of current Ukarane case. Russia takes action but america is shaking in fear to react. So, the law shall be "for every action there is reaction, if the reacting body is not afraid to react".

@EU_Commission Wow. A press statement. How about something more concrete. Something that will really hurt Russia. Kick them out of swift, freeze all assets, minimise trade, require visa if they want to visit. Just freeze them out. We don’t want pigs on our streets.
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN EU Act Now! Stop buying from killers! #HandsOffUkraine #russianinvasion

@EU_Commission be aware that every missile falling on Ukrainian soil is bought with your money from Russian gas.  Poland was right, Ukraine was right, the USA was right .. and you were pushing it in the EU anyway.
